sections.heading: REFUND & CANCELLATION POLICY
sections.body:
## Refund and Cancellation Policy

For details on our refund and cancellation policy, please visit [this link](https://cyberizegroup.com/refund-cancellation-policy/).

sections.heading: CHARGEBACK POLICY
sections.body:
## Payment Terms Summary

- **Payment Method**: If using a credit card, the Client agrees to the following:
  
  - **Chargeback Waiver**: The Client permanently and irrevocably waives the right to initiate a chargeback (disputed, reversed, or contested charge) once the Cyberize Group Team begins services.
  
  - **Violation of Agreement**: Initiating a chargeback is considered a material violation of this agreement and may cause unquantifiable long-term damages to Cyberize Group.
  
  - **Fraud Acknowledgment**: The Client acknowledges that any chargeback constitutes fraud and confesses to such fraud.
  
  - **Cost Responsibility**: The Client agrees to cover all costs incurred by Cyberize Group related to the chargeback.

### Call to Action
- Please ensure you understand these terms before proceeding with your payment.

sections.heading: AUTOMATIC RENEWAL SERVICE AGREEMENT
sections.body:
## Automatic Renewal Service Summary

- **Enrollment**: Your purchase may include automatic renewal for your membership, pre-paid service, workshop materials, or online course.
- **Functionality**: Renewal fees will be automatically charged to your payment method on file before expiration, requiring no further action from you.
- **Cancellation**: If you are on an ongoing support agreement, you can cancel this service anytime by contacting us at **(800) 983-0668**.
- **Fees**: Be aware that cancellation may incur fees. Please refer to your agreement for specific details.

sections.heading: PROJECT ABANDONMENT POLICY
sections.body:
# Project Pause Policy

- **Unresponsiveness**: If the Client is unresponsive for **14 days**, we may pause the project.
- **Resuming Work**: Projects will resume only when service bandwidth is available.
- **Re-Start Fee**: A **2% administrative re-start fee** based on the project budget will apply. This fee must be paid before rescheduling the project in our production calendar.

---

**Last Updated**: **February 16, 2018**

## Contact Information
- **Address**: 3110 Hatton St, Sarasota, FL
- **Phone**: [(800) 983-0668](tel:+18009830668)

sections.heading: This third party embed for Google Maps is being blocked
sections.body:
```markdown
## Google Maps Service Consent

We need your permission to load the Google Maps service. This third-party feature will not display until you provide consent. 

### Action Required
- **To load this service, please click 'Accept'.**

This content cannot load due to undisclosed trackers. The website owner must:
1. Add this third-party service to the final page of their Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire in their Termageddon account.
2. Click 'Submit' after adding the service.

Once completed, the service will load based on user consent choices.

### More Information
```
